Pre-Game Insights: The Mets have won each of their last six Thursday games as underdogs against National League opponents.
The Brewers have lost four of their last five playoff games as favorites.
The Mets have covered the run line in each of their last seven Thursday games as underdogs.
The Brewers have failed to cover the run line in six of their last seven home playoff games.
The Mets have led after 3 innings in six of their last eight games as road underdogs against NL Central opponents.
The Brewers have trailed after 5 innings in four of their last five playoff games as home favorites.
